problem_text_cn: 如图,铁道口的栏杆短臂长1米,长臂长16米,当短臂端点下降0.5米时,长臂端点升高()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the short arm length of the railing at the railway crossing is N_0 and the long arm length is N_1. When the end of the short arm drops by N_2, the end of the long arm rises ()
raw_answer:
解:设长臂端点升高x米,
则\frac{0.5}{x}=\frac{1}{16},∴x=8．
故选:C．
